name: Cold and Afraid
summary:
In the tranquil confines of a college town, an idyllic peace is shattered by the brutal murder of a student. Shocked and alarmed, the local authorities soon uncover a chilling truth:

​this ghastly act is merely the tip of the iceberg.

As a grim pattern emerges with each successive discovery of mutilated bodies, it becomes evident that a cunning serial killer is haunting the town, leaving a trail of terror in their wake.
